Localization.Name: FarSight "Thunderstrike" (8x Telescopic)
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: VOLT
Type: Telescopic
Attachment Point: Optic
Magnification: 8x
Aim Time: +0%
Size: 3

Designed for long distance precision shooting, the FarSight is carefully crafted to provide unparalleled fidelity of targets. VOLT's TruePicture lens technology provides high levels of light transmission, ensuring easy target acquisition and daylight illumination so you always get your mark.

The deep gray of the Thunderstrike edition emphasizes the weighty feel of the rifle.
